subject: Basketball (College)
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: Emmitt Holt, an Indiana freshman, was cited in Bloomington, Ind., on a charge of misdemeanor under-age drinking after he hit his teammate Devin Davis with his vehicle, leaving Davis hospitalized with a serious head injury, the police said.
snippet: Emmitt Holt, an Indiana freshman, was cited in Bloomington, Ind., on a charge of misdemeanor under-age drinking after he hit his teammate Devin Davis with his vehicle, leaving Davis hospitalized with a serious head injury, the police said.
